articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

7:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Cornwall, United Kingdom.           

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:30 a.m.

Cornwall, United Kingdom

6:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Cornwall, United Kingdom.

Cornwall Airport Newquay

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
